metadata.title: CVE-2017-17920 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** SQL injection vulnerability in the 'reorder' method in Rubyon Rails 5.1.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQLcommands via the 'name' parameter. NOTE: The vendor disputes this issuebecause the documentation states that this method is not intended for usewith untrusted input.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
